about_the_game:
Tartarus is a DungeonCrawler in Card format that will drop you into the fiery Inferno. Use your skills to kill as many creatures as possible and successfully pass the Mephisto's test... The Long Itinere. Harness the power of Virgo's light, the strength of Gabriel's shields, the ingenuity of Diocles' tricks or the mercenary techniques of Eris to show Mephisto what you're made of!!!

FEATURES


  • Unique progression system : Make your way through the dungeon by choosing from different paths with 3 cards each turn, but choose the best path, staying on sides is not always advantageous!

  • Tactics : With each action you will have to make decisions that will change the fate of the game. A merchant will help you in your hellish journey and much more to be discovered.

  • Procedural Generation : Thanks to this system, Gameplay will always be different but also increasingly complex. This will give you a chance to get to know your heroes better with each game.

What you'll find in Tartarus


  • 4 heroes to discover with compelling stories.

  • 4 different abilities for each hero.

  • Endless monsters and bosses to defeat.

  • 1 merchant who will offer you his goods for a few coins... Items that are sometimes FUNDAMENTAL to your path in the Long Itinere.

  • 4 types of items with different uses that will help you in your adventure.

  • 1 different inventory system for each hero...

This and Tartarus a Dungeon Crawler with a unique pixel art style of graphics

Our history


What is Tartarus - Longo Itinere? It is a dream of two boys, it is an opportunity to change their lives, it is their effort, it is their commitment, it is the desire to evolve and not give up.

Tartarus after years of development and challenges because none believed in them and in their abilities. This led Giacomo and Michael to try to publish their game on Steam with the hope of making their dream come true.

highlighted.name: We are only at the beginning...
The important thing is to believe it...

The Long Itinere. Harness the power of Virgo's light, the strength of Gabriel's shields, the ingenuity of Diocles' tricks or the mercenary techniques of Eris to show Mephisto what you're made of!!!

  • Tactics : With each action you will have to make decisions that will change the fate of the game. A merchant will help you in your hellish journey and much more to be discovered.

  • Procedural Generation : Thanks to this system, Gameplay will always be different but also increasingly complex. This will give you a chance to get to know your heroes better with each game.

  • 1 different inventory system for each hero...

Our history


What is Tartarus - Longo Itinere? It is a dream of two boys, it is an opportunity to change their lives, it is their effort, it is their commitment, it is the desire to evolve and not give up.

Tartarus after years of development and challenges because none believed in them and in their abilities. This led Giacomo and Michael to try to publish their game on Steam with the hope of making their dream come true.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Catalina (10.15.6)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Catalina (10.15.6)
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 650 1536 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Tartarus Longo Itinere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 1200Mhz / AMD Athlon MP
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8500 Series 64MB or NVIDIA GeForce 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.4GHz / AMD Sempron 2200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8500 Series 64MB or NVIDIA GeForce 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
